Simon Cowell Sunshine' follows Ben Donovan, the manager of a mid-tier sports arena who's trying to get his life in order at age 40 while a cast of crazies surrounds him in an already bizarre work environment. - Donald Rumsfeld `` goes so far as to depict former President Bush as presiding over a national security process that was marked by incoherent decision-making and policy drift, most damagingly on the war in Iraq.''- Donald Rumsfeld remains largely unapologetic about his overall handling of the Iraq conflict and concludes that the war has been worth the costs. Had the government of Saddam Hussein remained in power, he says, the Middle East would be` far more perilous than it is today'. -`` Addressing charges that he failed to provide enough troops for the war, he allows that,` In retrospect, there may have been times when more troops could have helped'.''

the company behind the Internet's dominant gateway. The surprise shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Mr. Eric Schmidt 's desire to tackle other challenges as much as Mr. Page's personal ambition. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Mr. Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google Inc. dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings. Mr. Eric Schmidt , 55, will become executive chairman and remain available to advise Mr. Page, 37, and Google Inc.
